protocolhandler.title: Handling Fount Protocol
protocolhandler.fountNotFound:
Oh dear :(

Fount was not found. Perhaps you need to install it first?

hero.title: Your Immersive AI Character Companion
hero.description: fount is an AI-powered role interaction platform designed to empower you. It is a bridge that connects you with your imagined characters, allowing you to easily talk to them, create your own characters, and share them with the world.

feature1.title: Seamless dialogue, anywhere
feature1.description: Start chatting on your computer and continue seamlessly on your phone or tablet. fount keeps your conversations in sync and stay in touch with your character wherever you go. Runs on Windows, macOS, Linux and even Android.

feature2.title: Beautiful, customisable interface
feature2.description: Choose from over 30 beautiful themes, or create your own. fount is your personal canvas. Express yourself, customise the environment to your preferences, and get a truly personalised experience.

feature3.title: Expressive, immersive chat
feature3.description: fount takes advantage of the power of HTML, allowing characters to express themselves through rich text, images, and even interactive elements. Have dynamic and engaging group chats with multiple characters at the same time.

feature4.title: Unbound AI source integration
feature4.description: Fount offers unparalleled choice and flexibility. Connect to any AI sources—OpenAI, Claude, OpenRouter, NovelAI, etc. Communication logic will be shaped by the power of code according to your wishes.

theme_selector.title: Choose your appearance
theme_selector.description: Choose a theme to personalise your experience.

mini_game.title: Play a little game
mini_game.description2: Here's a mini game to pass the time.

error.title: Installation failed!
error.description1: There seems to be something wrong with the fount installer.
